capabilities.name: fiberplane_list_traces
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of all traces, showing the root spans for each trace

capabilities.name: fiberplane_get_spans_for_trace
capabilities.description: Retrieves all spans for a specific trace ID

capabilities.name: fiberplane_list_all_registered_routes
capabilities.description: Lists all registered routes in the studio

capabilities.name: fiberplane_list_all_requests
capabilities.description: Lists all requests, logged in the studio

capabilities.name: fiberplane_send_request
capabilities.description: Send an HTTP request through Fiberplane Studio with tracing capabilities

capabilities.name: fiberplane_get_file_tree
capabilities.description: Gets the file tree for the current app
